description: Analysis scope configuration file used by Sigrid (sigrid-says.com)

default_excludes.description: When true, excludes files and directories from the analysis scope based on common conventions.

exclude.description: List of file and directory patterns to manually exclude from the analysis.

component_depth.description: Directory depth that will be used to define components.

languages.description: A list of technologies that should be included as part of the analysis.

model.description: Version of the SIG quality model that should be used for the analysis.

enabled.description: When true, will send alert email notifications when noteworthy events happen.

recipients.description: List of email addresses that should receive alerts.

enabled.description: When this *or* the 'blocklist' option is provided, OSH analysis is performed for every upload.

blocklist.description: List of patterns for library names that should not be sent to external services.

transitive.description: When true, transitive dependencies are also checked and included in the results.

exclude.description: List of file/directory patterns that should be excluded from the Open Source Health analysis.

enabled.description: Indicates that this system should be scanned for vulnerabilities using Checkmarx.

id.description: Unique ID to identify the Checkmarx project.

enabled.description: When true, architecture analysis will be triggered for each incoming upload.

model.description: Version of the SIG Architecture Quality Model to use.

exclude.description: List of exclude patterns that applies only to Architecture Quality, not globally.

custom_components.description: Overrides automatic component detection with components defined manually in scope file.

flatten_directories.description: List of directory names that should be flattened and not considered as components during the analysis.

add_dependencies.description: List of manually added dependencies on top of the ones detected automatically by the analysis.

remove_dependencies.description: List of dependencies that manually overrides the analysis and removes them from the results.

undesirable_dependencies.description: List of dependencies considered undesirable, and should therefore be highlighted in the visualization.

rename.description: Map of system elements for which to manually override the name.

merge_data_stores.description: Default is false. When true, skips automated data store detection and assumes one monolithic data store.

grouping.description: Annotate all top-level components matching the pattern, in order to divide them into logical groups.

history_enabled.description: Disables change history analysis when set to false.

history_period_months.description: Period to use for repository history analysis, default is last 12 months.

history_start.description: Repository history start date in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd', default is last year.

history_end.description: Repository history end date in the format 'yyyy-mm-dd', default is current date.

history_filter_outliers.description: Filters commits with an abnormally large amount of churn from the history analysis.

branch.description: Repository branch to use, comma-separated for multiple branches. Defaults to current branch.

duplication.description: Set to false to disable duplication detection, improves performance for huge systems.

co_evolution.description: Set to false to disable co-evolution detection, improves performance for huge systems.

disabled_metrics.description: List of metrics that should be removed from the analysis and set to N/A.

enabled.description: When true, third party findings analysis will be triggered for each incoming upload.

disabled_analyzers.description: List of third-party analyzers that should not be ran.

enabled_analyzers.description: List of third-party analyzer names that should be ran even though they are disabled by default.

include.description: List of file/directory patterns that should be included in the third party findings analysis beyond the maintainability scope and production configuration files.

exclude.description: List of file/directory patterns that should be excluded from the third party findings analysis.

title: Sigrid scope configuration file
